name: 10th International Summit on Global Warming and Environmental Science
content: ConferenceSeries takes the pleasure to welcome you to the 10th International Summit on Global Warming and Environmental Science which will be held from November 07-08, 2022 at Paris, France. This Conference mainly focuses on the theme "Mitigating the Global Warming to redefine a Sustainable Environment". Global Warming-2022 aims to bring researchers, scholars, scientists, policymakers, industry experts, bioenvironmental specialists, environmental science community, academicians and weather scientists on one platform to showcase their research efforts. We invite you all participants to attend the Global Warming-2022 from all around the world for a wonderful experience, networking opportunities, publishing and many more. Global Warming-2022 offers a unique platform for researchers, policy makers, and businesses to share their results, novel policy developments, and practical implementation experiences regarding climate change impacts and adaptation, as well as opportunities for business innovations aimed at supporting the transition to low carbon societies.
